name: Flushing Meadows Skatepark
description: Large concrete skatepark in Flushing Meadows Corona Park near the Unisphere.
history: Built as part of park improvements. Serves the large Queens skating community.
bestTimes: Afternoons. The park is huge so it rarely feels overcrowded.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, rails, ledges, quarter pipes, stairs. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Queens skate scene in Flushing. Built as part of park improvements. Serves the large Queens skating community.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 7 to Mets-Willets Point.. Afternoons. The park is huge so it rarely feels overcrowded.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark â€” standard park etiquette applies.
